item.title: 巴西石油产量在平台故障导致 11 月减产后反弹
item.description: 巴西的石油产量正在从上个月每天减少 30 多万桶的停产中反弹，这凸显了这个拉丁美洲最大的原油生产国是如何迷惑欧佩克微观管理市场的。【原文：Brazilian oil output is rebounding from outages that removed more than 300,000 barrels a day last month, highlighting how Latin America’s largest crude producer can confound OPEC efforts to micromanage the market.】

item.title: 欧洲股市随着经济相关板块的轮动而上涨
item.description: 由于市场对全球经济增长的信心增强，建筑材料和银行等与经济周期相关的板块受到市场追捧，欧洲股市走高。【原文：European stocks advanced as broader confidence on global growth sparked a rotation into sectors linked to the economic cycle, such as construction materials and banks.】

item.title: 甲骨文重燃对人工智能支出过高的担忧，美股下跌
item.description: 周四早盘，美国股市承压，原因是甲骨文公司的财报再次引发了人们对科技公司能否将其高昂的人工智能投资计划货币化的担忧。【原文：US equities are under pressure early Thursday as an earnings readout from Oracle Corp. reignited concerns about whether technology companies can monetize their lofty AI investment plans.】

item.title: 霍华德-马克斯警告美联储进一步降息意义不大
item.description: 橡树资本管理公司（Oaktree Capital Management LP）联合创始人霍华德-马克斯（Howard Marks）警告说，随着回报环境的缓和，美联储围绕货币成本的 "操纵 "将驱使人们进行更高风险的投资。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s “manipulations” around the cost of money will drive people into riskier investments as the return environment moderates, Oaktree Capital Management LP co-founder Howard Marks warned, adding he doesn’t see the merit in interest rates being much lower than they are now.】

item.title: 迪士尼向 OpenAI 投资 10 亿美元，达成授权协议
item.description: 迪斯尼公司同意向 OpenAI 投资 10 亿美元，并向 OpenAI 的人工智能短视频平台 Sora 授权米老鼠和灰姑娘等标志性角色。【原文：Walt Disney Co. agreed to invest $1 billion in OpenAI and license iconic characters like Mickey Mouse and Cinderella to Sora, OpenAI’s short-form, artificial intelligence video platform.】

item.title: 德国表示将支持希腊领导欧元区财长会议
item.description: 希腊财政部长拉尔斯-克林拜尔（Lars Klingbeil）表示，德国将支持希腊财政部长基里亚科斯-皮耶拉卡基斯（Kyriakos Pierrakakis）领导欧元区同行月度会议。【原文：Germany will back Greek finance chief Kyriakos Pierrakakis to head the monthly meetings of euro-area peers, according to Finance Minister Lars Klingbeil.】

item.title: 曼联大幅削减成本后仍在亏损
item.description: 尽管部分所有者吉姆-拉特克利夫（Jim Ratcliffe）大幅削减了这家英超俱乐部的成本，但曼联股份公司的亏损仍在继续。【原文：Manchester United PLC’s losses continued, despite part owner Jim Ratcliffe’s drastic cost cutting at the Premier League club.】

item.title: 有关欧尔班计划的报道发表后，匈牙利债券随福林下跌
item.description: 据彭博社报道，匈牙利总理维克托-欧尔班（Viktor Orban）正在探讨在 4 月份的议会选举后改用总统制的方案，匈牙利的美元债券和福林随之下滑。【原文：Hungary’s dollar bonds and the forint slid after Bloomberg reported that Prime Minister Viktor Orban is exploring the option of switching to a presidential system after a parliamentary election due in April.】

item.title: 英伟达挑战者摩尔警告股价狂飙后的交易风险
item.description: 中国人工智能芯片制造商摩尔芯动科技公司（Moore Threads Technology Co.【原文：Moore Threads Technology Co. warned investors about elevated trading risks after shares of the Chinese artificial intelligence chipmaker surged more than eightfold in the first week after its initial public offering.】

item.title: EQT 收购其支持的机器人初创公司的 1 万个人形机器人
item.description: 私募股权公司 EQT AB 计划向其投资的公司部署 10,000 台仿人机器人，这些机器人由其投资的一家初创公司制造。【原文：Private equity firm EQT AB plans to deploy 10,000 humanoid robots to its portfolio companies that are made by a startup it has invested in.】

item.title: 假期过后美国申请失业救济人数创 2020 年以来最大增幅
item.description: 美国失业救济金申请人数在感恩节假期周大幅下降之后，上周又创下了自大流行病爆发以来的最大增幅。【原文：Applications for US unemployment benefits rose last week by the most since the onset of the pandemic, after a big drop during the Thanksgiving holiday week.】

item.title: 巴伐利亚北欧公司收购失败后寻求债务和股权融资
item.description: 丹麦疫苗生产商巴伐利亚北欧公司（Bavarian Nordic A/S）首席执行官表示，在私有化交易失败后，该公司可能会利用债务融资和股票市场为其发展计划提供资金。【原文：Bavarian Nordic A/S may use debt financing and tap equity markets to fund its growth plans after a take-private deal for the Danish vaccine maker fell through, according to its chief executive officer.】

item.title: 美国贸易赤字意外缩减至2020年以来最小值
item.description: 由于出口激增，美国 9 月份的贸易赤字意外收窄至 2020 年中期以来的最小值。【原文：The US trade deficit unexpectedly narrowed in September to the smallest since mid-2020 as exports surged.】

item.title: 加拿大自一月份以来首次录得货物贸易盈余
item.description: 由于出口大幅反弹，进口下降，加拿大自 1 月份以来首次录得贸易顺差。【原文：Canada recorded a trade surplus for the first time since January as exports rebounded sharply and imports declined.】

item.title: 对冲基金正在重振一度沉寂的评估套利游戏
item.description: 埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）、曼集团（Man Group Plc）、AQR 资本管理公司（AQR Capital Management）的一家附属公司以及其他数十家投资公司正在重启一种一度休眠的套利工具，该工具可在审查最严格的美国商业法庭上对交易提出质疑。【原文：Elliott Investment Management, Man Group Plc, an AQR Capital Management affiliate and dozens of other investment firms are reviving a once-dormant arbitrage tool that challenges deals in the most closely scrutinized US business court.】

item.title: 欧佩克数据显示 2026 年全球石油市场将趋于平衡
item.description: 欧佩克（OPEC）保持了对 2026 年全球石油供应和需求的稳定预测，指出世界市场将保持平衡，这与普遍预测的过剩不符。【原文：OPEC kept forecasts for global oil supplies and demand in 2026 steady, pointing to a balanced world market that clashes with widespread predictions of a surplus.】

item.title: 困境投资者弗莱克斯以 1 欧元收购意大利钢铁厂，承诺提供就业岗位
item.description: 一位以扭转不良资产而闻名的美国投资者提出，如果政府允许他接管一家陷入困境的意大利钢铁厂，他将拯救该厂的数千个工作岗位。【原文：A US-based investor known for turning around distressed assets is offering to save thousands of jobs at a troubled Italian steel plant if the government allows him to take it over.】

item.title: 由外资支持的对冲基金在阿联酋遍地开花
item.description: 迪拜和阿布扎比是近年来全球最大的对冲基金纷纷设立前哨站的地方，现在正逐渐成为资金经理们寻求单干的中心。【原文：Dubai and Abu Dhabi — where some of the world’s biggest hedge funds have set up outposts in recent years — are now emerging as hubs for money managers looking to go it alone.】

item.title: 美国电力需求的增长不仅与人工智能有关
item.description: 燃气轮机制造商 GE Vernova 表示，新工厂和电动汽车也是需求的主要驱动力。【原文：Gas turbine maker GE Vernova says new factories and electric vehicles are also big demand drivers.】

item.title: Meta 的扎克伯格推动高薪人工智能实验室打造赚钱机器
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，莱利-格里芬（Riley Griffin）将报道 Meta 公司的人工智能研究人员面临的压力，他们必须为公司提供赚钱的产品。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Riley Griffin reports on the pressure Meta’s artificial intelligence researchers are under to deliver products that make money for the company.】

item.title: Medra 融资 5200 万美元，利用人工智能机器人加速药物研发
item.description: Medra公司利用人工智能对机器人进行编程，以开展和改进生物实验，该公司已筹集了5200万美元，用于建设美国最大的自主实验室之一。【原文：Medra, which programs robots with artificial intelligence to conduct and improve biological experiments, has raised $52 million to build what it says will be one of the largest autonomous labs in the United States.】

item.title: 乌克兰央行在外国援助不确定的情况下维持关键利率不变
item.description: 在国际盟国为基辅抵御俄罗斯入侵提供财政支持的不确定性日益增加之际，乌克兰维持利率不变。【原文：Ukraine left interest rates unchanged amid mounting uncertainty over financial support from international allies for Kyiv’s defense against the Russian invasion.】

item.title: 美联储转向 "静观其变"，向特朗普发出不祥挑战
item.description: 美国央行行长们表示，他们对进一步降息没有什么兴趣。【原文：US central bankers signaled little appetite for further rate cuts.】

item.title: 墨西哥新关税加剧了对中国出口的反弹
item.description: 此举使墨西哥与美国反对中国进口商品泛滥的立场保持一致【原文：Move aligns Mexico with US stance against flood of imports from China】

item.title: 顶级交易所将目光投向私募市场衍生品
item.description: 世界上一些最大的交易所已经把目光投向了与快速增长的价值 16 万亿美元的私人持有资产相关的新衍生品。【原文：Some of the world’s biggest exchanges have set their sights on creating new derivatives tied to the fast-growing $16-trillion universe of privately held assets.】

item.title: 加拿大顶级养老金公司 General Atlantic 将收购 Permira 的游艇集团
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，通用大西洋公司和加拿大养老金计划投资委员会（Canada Pension Plan Investments Board）即将达成收购休闲船艇在线市场 Boats Group 的交易。【原文：General Atlantic and Canada Pension Plan Investments Board are nearing a deal to acquire Boats Group, an online marketplace for recreational boats, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 暴涨 180% 后，博通 "注定失望
item.description: 受人工智能热潮的推动，博通公司（Broadcom Inc.但随着该公司将于周四收盘后发布季度财报，投资者不禁要问，这是否足以推动下一轮涨势。【原文：Broadcom Inc. has been one of the hottest stocks in the market this year, driven by the enthusiasm for all things artificial intelligence. But with its quarterly earnings due after the close Thursday, investors are wondering if that will be enough to power the next leg of the rally.】

item.title: 欧洲央行出人意料的 AT1 提案细节不足，引发混乱
item.description: 欧洲中央银行提议改变市场，但却没有解释如何改变，这让银行资本的一个关键部分的投资者感到困惑。【原文：Investors in a key piece of bank capital were left puzzled after the European Central Bank proposed changing the market without explaining how.】

item.title: 韩国将建立商业驱动的淡马锡式主权基金
item.description: 韩国正着手仿照新加坡淡马锡成立一个新的主权财富基金，旨在建立一个能够进行战略性和商业性投资的平台。【原文：South Korea is moving to establish a new sovereign wealth fund modeled after Singapore’s Temasek, aiming to build a platform capable of pursuing strategic and commercially-driven investments.】

item.title: 英国央行重整危机时期工具，帮助控制回购波动性
item.description: 英格兰银行正在使危机时期的贷款机制对银行更具吸引力，因为官员们正试图限制货币市场日益加剧的动荡。【原文：The Bank of England is making crisis-era lending facilities more attractive to banks, as officials seek to limit growing turbulence in money markets.】
